heading.title: Senior Frontend Developer
heading.subtitle: Specialized in React Development & Modern Frontend Architecture

summary: I’m a passionate frontend developer with over 15 years of experience building popular, high-traffic web applications. I specialize in creating responsive, user-friendly, and accessible interfaces using React, TypeScript, and modern UI frameworks. I enjoy collaborating in agile teams and leveraging AI-supported tools to deliver high-quality, well-structured, and maintainable code.

skills.label: Experience
skills.text: 15+ years in web development, with 7+ years specializing in React, TypeScript, Redux and other modern frontend technologies.

skills.label: UX & Design
skills.text: Keen eye for clean UI design, usability, and user-centric interfaces using modern CSS Frameworks like TailwindCSS and Material UI.

skills.label: Testing
skills.text: Strong focus on unit and integration testing using Jest, Vitest, Storybook, and React Testing Library.

skills.label: Architecture
skills.text: Experienced in component-driven development, modular architecture, and maintaining scalable frontend codebases.

skills.label: Tooling, Build & Operations
skills.text: Hands-on experience with modern bundling and build tools, including Webpack, Vite, and NPM/Yarn-based workflows, as well as leveraging AI-assisted tools to enhance development efficiency and code quality. Familiar with CI/CD pipelines, Git workflows, and version control.

skills.label: Approach
skills.text: Dedicated to responsive design, accessibility (WCAG standards), SEO best practices, and performance optimization.

tasks: Developed and maintained scalable React applications
Collaborated with UX designers to implement responsive layouts
Improved application performance by optimizing React components
Built and maintained websites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Worked in agile teams using Scrum and Kanban methodologies
